metadata.title: StayNeos | Premium Executive Apartment Rentals
metadata.description: StayNeos is a premium executive apartment platform for business professionals, offering quality properties, flexible leases, and 24/7 concierge service.

hero.title: Premium Executive Apartments
hero.subtitle: A premium executive apartment platform for business professionals, offering exceptional living experiences and attentive concierge services

features.title: Why Choose StayNeos
features.subtitle: We are committed to providing exceptional living experiences for every client, from property selection to check-in service, every detail is carefully crafted
features.qualityDesc: Carefully selected premium properties, ensuring every detail meets your expectations
features.flexibleDesc: Support short-term and long-term rentals, flexibly meeting different travel needs
features.serviceDesc: 24/7 concierge service for a more comfortable living experience
features.supportDesc: Professional customer service team ready to solve any issues

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Quality Life?
cta.subtitle: Register now as a member to enjoy exclusive discounts and personalized services

howItWorks.title: Three Simple Steps to Check In
howItWorks.subtitle: We've streamlined the entire process so you can focus on enjoying your stay

search.title: Search Properties
search.desc: Browse our curated properties, filter by location, price, and amenities

book.title: Book Online
book.desc: Select your dates, view real-time pricing, and complete your booking with one click

movein.title: Move In
movein.desc: Professional concierge welcome, fully equipped, start enjoying immediately

segments.title: Living Solutions for You
segments.subtitle: Whether for business travel, long-term projects, or relocation, we have options for you

business.title: Business Travel
business.subtitle: Corporate Discounts
business.desc: Convenient accommodation solutions for business professionals, near financial districts with easy transportation

longterm.title: Long-term Stay
longterm.subtitle: 20% Off Monthly
longterm.desc: Enjoy discounted prices for stays over one month, ideal for long-term projects or relocation

relocation.title: Relocation
relocation.subtitle: Flexible Move-in
relocation.desc: The ideal choice during your move, no long-term commitment required, move in immediately

footer.description: Carefully designed accommodation experiences for modern travelers. Whether for business or leisure, we provide the perfect living space.

property.defaultDescription:
This beautiful apartment in {location} features {bedrooms} spacious bedrooms and {bathrooms} modern bathrooms.

The apartment has a total area of {area} square meters and can accommodate up to {maxGuests} guests. The thoughtfully designed layout and high-quality finishes provide a comfortable living experience.

Located in a prime city center location with convenient transportation and complete surrounding facilities. Whether for business trips or family vacations, this is your ideal choice.
property.top10Desc: This home is highly ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability.
property.diveInDesc: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

wishlist.emptyDesc: Start exploring our properties and save your favorites here. You'll be able to compare them and book when you're ready.

emergency.title: Need Emergency Help?

hero.title: Maximize Your Rental Income
hero.subtitle: Partner with StayNeos and earn up to 30% more from your property. We handle everything while you enjoy passive income.

benefits.title: Why Partner With Us?
benefits.subtitle: We provide end-to-end property management services that help you earn more with less stress.

income.title: Higher Rental Income
income.desc: Earn up to 30% more compared to traditional long-term rentals. Our flexible pricing optimization ensures maximum returns.

protection.title: Property Protection
protection.desc: Comprehensive insurance coverage and security deposits protect your property. Regular inspections ensure everything stays in perfect condition.

management.title: Hassle-Free Management
management.desc: We handle everything from marketing to maintenance. No more midnight emergency calls or dealing with difficult tenants.

support.title: 24/7 Guest Support
support.desc: Our dedicated team handles all guest communications and support, so you don't have to worry about a thing.

marketing.title: Professional Marketing
marketing.desc: High-quality photography, compelling listings, and multi-platform promotion ensure maximum visibility for your property.

guests.title: Quality Guests
guests.desc: Rigorous guest screening process ensures your property is rented to verified, responsible guests only.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is easy. Three simple steps to start earning more.

step1.title: List Your Property
step1.desc: Submit your property details and we'll create a professional listing.

step2.title: We Handle Everything
step2.desc: From guest screening to cleaning, we manage the entire process.

step3.title: Get Paid
step3.desc: Receive monthly payouts directly to your account. It's that simple.

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning More?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of landlords who trust StayNeos with their properties.

hero.title: Corporate Housing Solutions
hero.subtitle: Premium furnished apartments for your business needs. Flexible terms, prime locations, and dedicated support for corporate clients.

solutions.title: Solutions for Every Need
solutions.subtitle: From individual business travelers to large project teams, we have the perfect accommodation solution.

housing.title: Corporate Housing
housing.desc: Fully furnished apartments for relocating employees and long-term business travelers. Flexible lease terms from 1 month to 1 year.

group.title: Group Accommodations
group.desc: Multiple units for project teams, training groups, or conference attendees. Centralized billing and dedicated account management.

mobility.title: Global Mobility
mobility.desc: Seamless relocation support for international assignees. We handle everything from airport pickup to local orientation.

executive.title: Executive Suites
executive.desc: Premium accommodations for C-suite executives and VIP guests. Luxury finishes and concierge services included.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your corporate housing?
cta.subtitle: Contact our corporate sales team for custom quotes and dedicated account management.

contact.pageSubtitle: Have questions or need assistance? Our team is here to help you. Get in touch with us through any of the channels below.
